extendedInfo.description: â¢  WHAT IS MANGLI-DOSH/MANGLI YOG IN YOUR HOROSCOPE?â¢  IS IT REALLY DISTURBING THE HAPPINESS OF YOUR MARRIED LIFE?        YES, it is true that the MANGLI-DOSH or MANGLI YOG in a horoscope of a person disturbs the happiness of his/her married life. It is due to SINS of previous birth. This yog of âMARSâ may result in separation/divorce to a married person. This bad situation of married life happens due to SINS of previous birth.         Now question is that whatever sins we have done in previous birth, what is the remedy of this? How we can achieve the happiness of our married life?â¢  DONâT FEAR IT.        All the pleasure of married life and good relation between wife and husband can be achieved, if we do some little remedies with full belief and positiveness of mind.        If anyone of having Mangali-Dosh does the remedies given here for minimum 40 days or more continuously. He/She can get a good result in his/her life and can minimize the bad effect of MANGALI-DOSH.
